basic_information.scholarship_name: Mary Elizabeth Morelli Outstanding Graduate Student Award

description: This scholarship was established by Dr. Brad Morelli, former Senior Legal Counsel for UCO, to honor his mother. Must be nominated by CLA faculty to apply. Eligibility Requirements Liberal Arts major Graduate student

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
